author: asmahanee
title: Racial Profiling
text: My first trip to Paris outside of CDG and I'm here at the Marriott Opera in Paris and have just experienced racial profiling. It is not the first time and because of my travels I'm sure it won't be the last. I have always used Marriott Hotels for years because of the comfort and courtesy and because of all the money and time spent on them I have earned the Executive privilege. I was the first person to enter the lounge of the hotel mentioned above and after about 5 minutes the woman decides to ask me for my room number. 6 people walked in right after me (that did not look like me) and she never once opened her mouth to ask for their room number. I brought this to the attention of the front desk and they told me it is policy for her to ask for the room number. I told them they are full of it because she didnt ask anyone else for their room number and how would I have gotten in without a key. Marriott Opera will not see me again.
